text.div:
CareConnect Interpretation Code

This value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate the meaning/use of a reference range.

Copyright Statement: Copyright © 2018 NHS Digital

This code system https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/CodeSystem/CareConnect-InterpretationCode-1 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
OR Outside Reference Range
PA Potentially Abnormal

name: CareConnect Interpretation Code
description: This value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate the meaning/use of a reference range.
